message: The next day, I wake up just before noon.
At least, that's what the clock says. It's still night outside, as it always is in Platinum Jail.
I'm glad I don't have to live here.
I sit on the edge of the bed and rub my eyes.
It feels like I just had a nightmare.
I can't remember what it was about, but it's left me with a bit of a headache.
My mood is less than stellar when I pick up Ren and leave the room.
I sit down on the couch and turn on the TV, hoping for news of the Celebration.

Sure enough, images of the main street fill the screen. A smiling reporter is standing before a teeming mass of people.

Loud music pours through the speakers as the parade progresses.
The feed continues with the same image for a bit before switching to a newscaster in a studio.

name: 女アナウンサー
message: "...Today at 1 PM, Mr. Toue Tatsuo will be greeting his guests from Oval Tower."

name: 女アナウンサー
message: "This message will be broadcast on all channels. Please gather in front of the tower if you wish to attend."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Toue."
I'll never forget his face.
He's the one who ganked me while I was trying to rescue Granny.
I can't let him win.
Today at 1 PM, Toue will appear at Oval Tower. I guess I have a little time until then.
Gotta get ready.
I stand. Ren hops off the couch and shakes his fluffy body.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ren, how you doing? Okay?"

name: 蓮
message: "No issues."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Good. Let's head out. You remember that event I mentioned yesterday? Toue's gonna be there."

name: 蓮
message: "Understood."
Ren seems fine... but I can't shake my concerns after everything that happened yesterday.
Resolved to keep a close eye on him, I head back to my room to get ready.
